attributes.additional_details:
Listen up ladies!
I think it's now time to put a stop to us having to pay a small fortune each month for something we cannot control and do not choose to have!
I believe that standard tampons and towels should be provided free of charge to women, if you can get a free pregnancy test and free contraception- things that have to be used through choice, then why shouldn't sanitary products also be provided for free?!
